title: Evil paedophile who raped and abused boys as young as 7 is jailed for 26 years
text:

A serial paedophile who raped and sexually assaulted two boys across a 15-year period has been jailed.

Birmingham Crown Court heard Syrwan Hakim repeatedly attacked his victims from when they were as young as seven and 10.

His heinous acts came to light when one victim courageously came forward to report the historic crimes to the force earlier this year, Birmingham Live reports.

He spoke to specialist officers who offered support and launched an investigation, which subsequently discovered another boy had also suffered similar physical and emotional torment at the hands of Hakim.

The 44-year-old from Handsworth, West Midlands, was convicted of 23 offences including rape, sexual assault, attempted rape and assault and sentenced to 26 years in jail on October 4.

(Image: BirminghamLive WS)

He was also placed on the sex offender register for life, given indefinite restraining orders and sexual harm prevention orders to prevent him from contacting boys under the age of 18.

Det Con Philip Langstone, from the child abuse investigation team, said: "Hakim preyed on their age and innocence to repeatedly carry out sex attacks on these boys.

"We don’t underestimate the trauma this would have caused them to relive what happened but it is through this bravery we have been able to protect others by putting Hakim behind bars for a long time.

"We know how difficult it can be for people to come forward and report what happened to us, which is why we have specialist officers available to support them through this."

Survivors of sexual abuse can also speak to the NSPCC 24 hours a day on 0808 800 5000, and more information can be found on their website .
description: Syrwan Hakim, form Handsworth, West Midlands, raped and sexually assaulted his victims across a 15-year period, Birmingham Crown Court heard
